data.prayer: Over 37.62 percent of the people of Dordogne are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dordogne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, disrupt complacency in the 5,216 believers living in the county of Dordogne. Remind them you are coming soon.
data.verse: Therefore, stay awake, for you do not know on what day your Lord is coming.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Dordogne do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Dordogne.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Dordogne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Father, make bold the prophets in Dordogne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.section_summary:
the county of Dordogne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France has a population of 424,500.

We estimate Dordogne has 5,216 people who might know Jesus, 259,590 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 159,694 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 81 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Dordogne, Nouvelle-Aquitaine, France. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
